articles.author: Abhijeet Mishra
articles.title: US Galaxy S23 users: Time to update to One UI 7 (Android 15)! - SamMobile
articles.description: Samsung has released the much-awaited One UI 7.0 update, based on Android 15, to the Galaxy Tab S9 series in European countries. The update brings a brand-new UI design, several new and improved features, and new Galaxy AI features to the high-end tablets. Ga…
articles.content: Galaxy S23, Galaxy S23+, and Galaxy S23 Ultra owners in the USA are getting an excellent weekend gift: Samsung has started rolling out the One UI 7 (Android 15) update to the Galaxy S23 lineup states… [+978 chars]
